name: Plant Defender (Broken Bag Games, rennaiscentist_dragon, gonudo, Noormis)
name_original: Plant Defender (Broken Bag Games, rennaiscentist_dragon, gonudo, Noormis)
description: Plant Defender, is a game made in the Global Game Jam 2022 over a period of 48 hours. It feature the theme duality with Fire and Water, Burning evil plants that try to destroy your Good Plants
